snippet.title: CHUCK NOLEMLAND - The Starving Kid (DEMO) WALKTROUGH FULL GAMEPLAY
snippet.description:
Welcome to the full gameplay walkthrough of CHUCK NOLEMLAND - The Starving Kid (DEMO)! This is a retro-style horror rage game with a bizarre and unique twist. In this demo, you’ll step into a strange world where your survival depends on feeding Chuck’s starving son—an immobile kid trapped behind glass. But beware—if the kid starves, Chuck will come after you!

Discover the quirky and unsettling mechanics, from throwing melons into a feeding hole to gliding on a maze of wires on just one wheel. Can you outsmart Chuck and his son, or will the madness consume you?

Download the demo now and experience the chaos for yourself:
👉 https://redcap-games.itch.io/chuck-nolemland-the-starving-kid
